company.name: Baby Education Animal Weather Toys LTD.

name: Mad Teacher
storyline: What do you do when your teacher has gone mad?! It’s time to get revenge! Have a blast with the craziest school pranks you’ve ever seen. Set off firecrackers, make her fart on a Whoopie cushion, tie her shoelaces together, and more! Oh no - now she's even MORE mad and there's going to be some punishments. But you have a genius plan! Set her up on a date with the gorgeous gym teacher, and she’ll forget she was mad! It’s up to you to set the perfect romantic picnic, so they kiss and fall in love!
summary: Mad Teacher is an IOS game release in 2017.
